thread.title: Throwback Thursday: Harbaugh sports MSU gear
thread.title_full: Throwback Thursday: Harbaugh sports MSU gear

title: Throwback Thursday: Harbaugh sports MSU gear
text:
Previous Next 
(WXYZ) - As we're just two days away from the Michigan State versus Michigan game, we dug into our archives and found a great video for this week's Throwback Thursday. 
The video was taken inside MSU's locker room 16 years ago. The reason he's wearing green and white, Harbaugh's sister is married to Tom Crean, who is Indiana's head coach. In 1999, Crean was Tom Izzo's top assistant. 
Don Shane was talking to Harbaugh, who said, "Don't tell Bo, whatever you do." 
Check out the awesome video above.
